comments.body: I seek to have every home instance node that comes out. I often bring people in to farm it. I would like someone to create an API (like GW2efficiency) that would calculate the value in gold of “everything” in your current home instance that you can harvest and sell on the TP. This would exclude things that come out of chests or otherwise can not be predicted.
